page.title: 16CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: Although our primary school children play many of the national sports e.g. football,netball,table tennis, volleyball,rounders,athletics,cricket, chess,we were interested in the type of games played in the playground. Having talked with people from an older generation we noticed how some games remained same.e.g.conkers, hopscotch,British Bulldog,skipping rhymes.However it is noticeable that our children either play games with sophisticated equipment or are still able to make up their own games with little or no equipment.In addition there seems to be an increasing proportion of children who need to copy games from television or even find it difficult to play games with others.
